org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling
Class OnStartupTriggeringPolicy

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling.OnStartupTriggeringPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
TriggeringPolicy
public class OnStartupTriggeringPolicy
extends Object
implements TriggeringPolicy

Trigger a rollover on every restart. The target file's timestamp is compared with the JVM start time and if it is older isTriggeringEvent will return true. After isTriggeringEvent has been called it will always return false.
